S0071: 我们不想让任何人听到真相。
We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.
S0072: I think that you're doing very well.
S0073: 非常感谢，但是我还有更多要学习。
Thank you very much, but I've got more to learn.
S0074: 非常感谢你帮助我理解。
Thank you very much for helping me to understand.
S0075: Have you got more to learn?
S0076: 我对我已经学了这么多感到很高兴。
I'm very happy with how much I've learnt already.
S0077: 我对我开始理解得这么快感到惊讶。
I'm surprised at how quickly I'm starting to understand.
S0078: I don't understand what you said.
S0079: 你什么时候开始学习的？
When did you start to learn?
S0080: 我不确定我什么时候会准备好。
I'm not sure when I'll be ready.
S0081: When do you want to start?
S0082: 我不会等你。为什么不呢？
I'm not going to wait for you. Why not?
S0083: 我同意你对你朋友说的话。
I agree with what you said about your friend.
S0084: 我不同意他对我朋友说的话。
I don't agree with what he said about my friend.
S0086: 不幸的是，这是不可能的。
S0087: They are people I don't know.
S0088: 我还没准备好和我不认识的人说话。
I'm not ready to talk to people I don't know yet.
S0089: 我认为我在短时间内做了很多。
I think that I've done a lot in a short time.
S0090: 如果你能说得慢一点那就太好了。
If you can speak more slowly that would be great.
S0091: 很难想得足够快来及时回答。
It's difficult to think quickly enough to answer in time.
S0092: 我想继续做这个一段时间。
I'd like to keep on doing this for a while.
S0094: 这是唯一的方法让它起作用。
This is the only way it will work.
S0095: 你准备好坐下一班公共汽车回家吗？
Are you ready to go home on the next bus?
S0096: 不，我还没准备好，我需要多一点时间。
No I'm not ready yet, I need a little more time.
S0097: 是的，我准备好了，只要你想我就可以走。
Yes I'm ready to go as soon as you want.
S0098: 我应该考虑玩别的东西。
I should consider playing something else.
S0099: 你应该问问你自己为什么它不起作用。
You should ask yourself why it's not working.
S0100: 你不应该担心做类似的事情。
You shouldn't worry about doing something similar.
S0101: 我很享受了解更多关于这个语言的事情。
I'm enjoying finding out more about this language.
S0102: 我们正在试图说它不是那样的。
We're trying to say that it's not like that.
S0103: 我们不是在试图听更多的词。
We're not trying to hear many more words.
S0104: 我们需要改变我们正在做的事情。
We need to change what we're doing.
S0105: 这就是为什么他不知道答案。
That is why he didn't know the answer.
S0106: 我们不需要感到高兴，我们只需要努力工作。
We don't need to feel happy, we just need to work hard.
S0107: 我们希望看到你正在做什么。
We hoped to see what you were doing.
S0108: 我们没有希望在半夜醒来。
We didn't hope to wake in the middle of the night.
S0109: 我们必须努力工作来学习很多新词。
We must work hard to learn a lot of new words.
S0110: 我们是朋友，在我们结束后我想放松一下。
We're friends, and after we finish I'd like to relax.
S0111: 当我们学习新东西的时候它改变我们的大脑。
When we learn something new it changes our brain.
S0112: 那非常有趣，我没有期待它。
That was very interesting, and I wasn't expecting it.
S0113: 为什么我不能记得你说的话？
Why can't I remember what you said?
S0114: 我感觉好像我今天做得比昨天差。
I feel as if I'm doing worse today than yesterday.
S0115: 我不觉得好像我准备好进行对话了。
I don't feel as if I'm ready to have a conversation.
S0116: 这不是我能做的最好选择。
This isn't the best choice I could make.
S0117: 我绝对做得比我们上次互相交谈时更好。
I'm definitely doing better than I was last time we talked to each other.
S0118: 我感觉比我们在酒吧时我感觉的更好。
I feel better than I felt when we were in the pub.
S0119: 在你离开前我能问你一些事情吗？
Can I ask you something before you leave?
S0120: 你喜欢坐公共汽车去这很有趣。
It's interesting that you like to go by bus.
S0121: 你不喜欢用你的车这很不寻常。
It's unusual that you don't like to use your car.
S0122: 它开始感觉更容易了，我对它的进展感到兴奋。
It's starting to feel easier and I'm excited about how it's going.
S0123: I think that's a good idea.
S0124: I thought that was a good idea.
S0125: 我相信你的主意非常好。
I believe that your idea was very good.
S0126: 这个工作正在改变我大脑的形状。
This work is changing the shape of my brain.
S0127: 那不是为什么我想见你。
That isn't why I wanted to see you.
S0128: 你像我以前认识的某个人。
You're like someone I used to know.
S0129: 我很高兴你做得这么好。
I'm so happy that you're doing so well.
S0130: 那是个惊喜，因为他是我的朋友。
That was a surrpise, because he's my friend.
S0131: 有太多想法在我的脑海里转。
There are too many ideas going around in my head.
S0132: 那比她正在说的不那么令人兴奋。
That's less exciting than what she was saying.
S0133: 当你们一起工作的时候你会非常了解一个人。
You get to know someone very well when you work together.
S0134: 当你和他们一起做困难的事情时这不是问题。
It's not a problem when you work at something difficult with them.
S0135: 我不知道为什么你认为它这么好。
I don't know why you think that it's so good.
S0136: 当然你可以问她，因为她是我的朋友。
Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.
S0137: 经常说话比完美更重要。
It's more important to talk often than to be perfect.
S0138: 这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方。
This was where my friend wanted to meet us.
S0139: 对不起我需要这么早离开。
I'm sorry that I need to leave so early.
S0140: 对不起我看不到你试图给我看的东西。
I'm sorry that I can't see what you're trying to show me.
